mapper.update: CREATE TABLE Products ( product_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(100), price INT, category VARCHAR(100), quantity_available INT, last_update TIMESTAMP );

CREATE TABLE Orders ( order_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(30), quantity_ordered INT, total_price INT, latitude DECIMAL(8, 5), longitude DECIMAL(9, 5), date_time TIMESTAMP );

CREATE TABLE Deliveries ( delivery_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, order_id INT, delivery_status VARCHAR(20), latitude DECIMAL(8, 5), longitude DECIMAL(9, 5), delivery_time TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES Orders(order_id) );

CREATE TABLE Baskets ( basket_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, product_id INT, delivery_id INT, temperature DECIMAL(5, 2), humidity DECIMAL(5, 2), freshness DECIMAL(5, 2), FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Products(product_id), FOREIGN KEY (delivery_id) REFERENCES Deliveries(delivery_id) );

CREATE TABLE Recalls ( recall_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, delivery_id INT, is_recalled BOOLEAN, recall_date TIMESTAMP, postponed_delivery_date TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (delivery_id) REFERENCES Deliveries(delivery_id) );

CREATE TABLE OrderDetails ( detail_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, order_id INT, product_id INT, quantity INT, price INT, FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES Orders(order_id), FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Products(product_id) );
